title.rendered: Marine Casualty Market Briefing Webinar – Vessel Lay-up and Reactivation

content.rendered:
Join AqualisBraemar Marine experts for our Market Briefing webinar at 3:30pm GMT on Thursday 9th April 2020. We will be discussing the types of vessel lay-up, as well as some issues that have arisen during improper lay-up and some drawbacks from laying up a vessel. We will also be going over the process to bring a vessel back on-line during reactivation, including Class, P&I and H&M insurance.

This technical presentation will be presented by Romen Cross, Senior Surveyor. 

This will be followed by Case Reports providing an overview of the recent major cases of interest that AqualisBraemar have been dealing with.

This will be presented by Paul Hill, Marine MD Europe & Africa. 

This briefing will be chaired by Mark McGurran, Global MD Marine. 

If you wish to register please follow the link to the webinar registration page:

Register

excerpt.rendered: Join AqualisBraemar Marine experts for our Market Briefing webinar at 3:30pm GMT on Thursday 9th April 2020.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Webinar: December Marine Market Briefing
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Registration is now open for our December Market Briefing Webinar for maritime and insurance professionals. Join our experts who will look at semi-submersible and Heavy Lift ships, focusing on design features, uses and risk factors.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Webinar - July Marine Market Briefing
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Register for our July Market Briefing for the maritime and maritime insurance sectors, our experts will be presenting on shiprepair & shipbuilding in Turkey, specifically the development of the shipyards in the Tuzla and Yalova area.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Webinar: October Marine Market Briefing
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Registration is now open for our October Market Briefing Webinar for maritime and insurance professionals. Join our experts who will look at the challenges arising from the Covid-19 pandemic and the consequences it has had for marine warranty surveys on current and future projects. The webinar is scheduled for Thursday…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Webinar: September Marine Market Briefing
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Register now for our September Market Briefing Webinar for maritime & insurance professionals and join our experts who will be detailing first-hand experiences of our findings during ‘Shipshape©’ Risk Assessment Surveys.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Webinar: August Marine Market Briefing
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Register now for our August Market Briefing Webinar for maritime & insurance professionals and join our experts who will be discussing the current status of the Salvage Market and new developments in this sector.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Seafarers Awareness Week
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: AqualisBraemar’s Mark McGurran, group managing director of Marine, discusses the importance of our seafarers, especially at this time, looks back on his seafaring career and reflects on the challenge of looking for a career ashore and how we at AqualisBraemar strive to be that second career for seafarers.
